item.title: How to Squash Last N Commits in Git?
item.description: We often need to squash several related commits to make the commit history cleaner. There are several different ways to achieve this.

item.title: A Guide on Squashing Commits with git-rebase
item.description: In this post, I would like to share how to squash commits using git-rebase.
